---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update checkout transaction"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/checkouts/update-exchange-transaction"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates quantities, due dates, or status adjustments for an existing checkout/check-in transaction. Use this to correct data entry mistakes or extend a loan without reissuing a new checkout record.

**Prerequisites**
1. **AssetCheckoutId + ExchangeActionId** - Obtain identifiers from [POST /api/v1.0/assets/checkouts/transactions/query/get](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-checkout-transactions) or the response from a checkout/transfer operation.

**Workflow Example**
1. Query recent transactions to find the transaction identifiers.
2. [POST /api/v1.0/assets/checkouts/update-exchange-transaction](/docs/api/assets/update-asset-exchange-transaction) with the identifiers and updated fields (for example `CheckoutDueDate`).

**Minimal Required Fields**: `AssetCheckoutId`, `ExchangeActionId` (request body).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Payload to update an existing checkout or checkin transaction.","allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Identifies a specific exchange transaction linked to a checkout.","properties":{"AssetCheckoutId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Checkout identifier."},"ExchangeActionId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Inventory action identifier representing the exchange."}},"required":["AssetCheckoutId","ExchangeActionId"],"title":"AssetExchangeTransactionDto"},{"type":"object","properties":{"Quantity":{"type":"number","description":"Adjusted quantity for the transaction.","nullable":true},"CheckoutDueDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Updated due date for the checkout transaction.","nullable":true},"CheckinAssetStatusTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Status to apply on checkin.","nullable":true}}}],"title":"UpdateAssetExchangeTransactionRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
